name: Magicway
overview: Magic Way is an Action game, developed and published by Schatztruhe, which was released in Europe in 1992. It was published in Schatztruhe #1231. Magicway is a fantastic jump&run game that takes place in a fairytale landscape. Colorful animations, superbly animated game scenes and enchanting music complete this fun game. Your task is to control the magician and discover worlds that no human has seen before.
